songs.title: Bad Blood (Lunice Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore
(Hear you talk about it anymo-ore)
I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore
(Hear you talk about it anymo-ore)
I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore
(Hear you talk about it anymo-ore)
I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-o-o-ore
(Hear you talk about it anymo-o-o-ore)

[Bridge]
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
O-oh oh
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
O-oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
(Hear about the bad blood any)
O-oh oh
O-oh oh
(O-oh oh, O-oh oh, O-oh oh, hey, O-oh oh)

[Chorus 1]
All this bad blood here
Won't you let it dry?
(All this bad blood here)
(Won't you let it dry?)
It's been cold for years
Won't you let it lie?
(It's been cold for years)
(Won't you let it lie?)

[Verse 1]
If we're only ever looking back
We will drive ourselves insane
As the friendship goes
Resentment grows
We will walk our different ways

[Pre-Chorus]
But those are the days that bind us
Together, forever
And those little things define us
Forever, forever
O-oh oh

[Chorus 2]
All this bad blood here
Won't you let it dry?
(All this bad blood here)
(Won't you let it dry?)
It's been cold for years
Won't you let it lie?
(It's been cold for years)
(Won't you let it lie?)

[Verse 2]
And I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore
I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-ore
I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore
I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-o-o-ore
(Hey)

[Outro]
(I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore)
(I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-ore)
(I don't wanna hear about the bad blood anymo-ore)
(I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-ore)
(I don't wanna hear you talk about it anymo-o-ore)
(Hear you talk about it anymore)
